MyBio::LocusCollection Iterator
SummaryIncluded librariesPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
MyBio::LocusCollection::Iterator - Iterator object for the MyBio::LocusCollection data structure
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Inherit
MyBio::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # Offers iterator methods like "next" for a MyBio::LocusCollection. 

    # To initialize 
    my $locus_collection_iter = MyBio::LocusCollection::Iterator->new({
        DATA_STRUCTURE        => undef,
    });
Description
    The primary data structure supported by this object is a 2D hash whose primary key is the strand 
    and its secondary key is the chromosome name. Each such pair of keys correspond to an
    array reference which stores generic objects.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->set_data_stucture($$data{DATA_STRUCTURE});
	$self->init;
	
	return $self;
}

sub array_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{ARRAY_IDX};
}

increment_array_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub increment_array_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{ARRAY_IDX}++;
}
increment_chr_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub increment_chr_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{CHR_IDX}++;
}
increment_strand_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub increment_strand_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{STRAND_IDX}++;
}
initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub init {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	$self->init_strand_idx;
	$self->init_chr_idx;
	$self->init_array_idx;
	$self->init_strands_ref;
	$self->update;
}
init_array_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub init_array_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{ARRAY_IDX} = -1;
}
init_chr_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub init_chr_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{CHR_IDX} = 0;
}
init_strand_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub init_strand_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{STRAND_IDX} = 0;
}
init_strands_refdescriptionprevnextTop
sub init_strands_ref {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{STRANDS_REF} = [keys %{$self->data_stucture}];
}
iterator_closuredescriptionprevnextTop
sub iterator_closure {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	return sub {
		if ($self->next_idx_set) {
			return $self->array_ref->[$self->array_idx];
		}
		else {
			return undef;
		}
	};
}
nextdescriptionprevnextTop
sub next {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->iterator_closure->();
}
next_idx_setdescriptionprevnextTop
sub next_idx_set {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	if ($self->array_idx < $#{$self->array_ref}) {
		$self->increment_array_idx;
	}
	else {
		$self->reset_array_idx;
		if ($self->chr_idx < $#{$self->chrs_ref}) {
			$self->increment_chr_idx;
		}
		else {
			$self->reset_chr_idx;
			if ($self->strand_idx < $#{$self->strands_ref}) {
				$self->increment_strand_idx;
			}
			else {
				$self->init;
				return 0;
			}
		}
	}
	$self->update;
	return 1;
}
reset_array_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub reset_array_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{ARRAY_IDX} = 0;
}
reset_chr_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub reset_chr_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{CHR_IDX} = 0;
}
reset_strand_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub reset_strand_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{STRAND_IDX} = 0;
}
set_data_stucturedescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_data_stucture {
	my ($self, $value) = @_;
	
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{DATA_STRUCTURE} = $value;
	}
}
stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub strand {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{STRAND};
}
strand_idxdescriptionprevnextTop
sub strand_idx {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{STRAND_IDX};
}
strands_refdescriptionprevnextTop
sub strands_ref {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{STRANDS_REF};
}
updatedescriptionprevnextTop
sub update {
	my ($self) = @_;
	
	$self->update_strand;
	$self->update_chrs_ref;
	$self->update_chr; # remember to update chrs_ref first (above)
	$self->update_array_ref;
}
update_array_refdescriptionprevnextTop
sub update_array_ref {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{ARRAY_REF} = $self->data_stucture->{$self->strand}->{$self->chr};
}
update_chrdescriptionprevnextTop
sub update_chr {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{CHR} = $self->chrs_ref->[$self->chr_idx];
}
update_chrs_refdescriptionprevnextTop
sub update_chrs_ref {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{CHRS_REF} = [keys %{$self->data_stucture->{$self->strand}}]
}
update_stranddescriptionprevnextTop
sub update_strand {
	my ($self) = @_;
	$self->{STRAND} = $self->strands_ref->[$self->strand_idx];
}

    # Get next entry
    my $next_entry = $locus_collection_iter->next();
